price: በናንተም ምክንያት ባሕሩን በከፈልን ጊዜ (አስታውሱ)፡፡ ወዲያውም አዳንናችሁ፡፡ የፈርዖንንም ቤተሰቦች እናንተ የምትመለከቱ ኾናችሁ አሰጠምናቸው፡፡
arabic: وَإِذۡ فَرَقۡنَا بِكُمُ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰكُمۡ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَآ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh faraqnā bikumu al-baḥra fa-anjaynākum wa-aghraqnā āla fir'ʿawna wa-antum tanẓurūna
